186019400.review:
Very boring and frustrating. The map is huge and empty and you rarely have a clear line of sight on any animals due to the dense bushes and tree lines. You'll only find something to shoot if you go to open areas or if you spend 15 minutes crawling towards a mating/warning call. Even when I shoot a deer, there have been countless times where they have ran off with 'Very Low' bleeding which basically means I'd have to track it for like 10 minutes again.

Progression is agonisingly slow and it seems like most of the necessary things to make the game more enjoyable take hours to unlock. Things like, quieter movement, reducing your own visibility, zeroing on scopes and a wider variety of weapons.

It's supposed to be realistic but there were probably better ways to balance realism and keep it enjoyable which the devs so far have failed to implement.

185934581.review:
W grze spędziłem już ponad 120 godzin, i muszę przyznać ani chwili się nie nudziłem The Hunter Call of the Wild to nie tylko zwykła gra myśliwska, ale prawdziwy symulator z niesamowitą atmosferą. Jednak, żeby w pełni cieszyć się rozgrywką, potrzeba cierpliwości i dokładności. Każdy krok ma znaczenie  spłoszenie zwierzyny czy niecelny strzał mogą kosztować Was szansę na udane polowanie.
Rozgrywka i mechaniki myśliwskie:
Twoim głównym zadaniem w grze jest polowanie na rzadkie gatunki zwierząt oraz zdobywanie najwyższej klasy trofeów, takich jak "Diament" – odznaka przyznawana za perfekcyjny strzał  w mityczne zwierze oraz spełnienie określonych wymagań.
Każde zwierzę ma unikalne cechy i wymaga innej strategii:
Doskonały słuch – trzeba poruszać się cicho, unikając biegu oraz krzaków i gałęzi
Wyostrzony węch – warto dbać o kierunek wiatru, aby nie wydać swojej pozycji warto też zainwestować w wabiki zapachowe ponieważ możemy to wykorzystać na naszą korzyść 
Ostry wzrok – ukrywanie się i korzystanie z osłon Musicie się przyzwyczaić do powolnego chodzenia w przykucu a nawet czołgania się przydatne tu będą dlc które pozwalają przenosić konstrukcje do bycia mniej widocznym dla zwierząt
Jeżeli zależy Wam na precyzji, warto korzystać z dobrze dobranych broni – w grze znajdziecie szeroki arsenał, od karabinów po łuki, a każda broń ma swoje przeznaczenie dla różnych rodzajów zwierzyny.( nie możesz strzelać z tej samej broni do żubra i do królika  gra bierze pod uwagę czas śmierci zwierzęcia ile strzałów oddałeś , czy uszkodziłeś trofeum np czaszkę u jelenia oraz czy strzelałeś z odpowiedniej broni/amunicji )
Gra podstawowa jest świetna, ale prawdziwy potencjał tej produkcji rozkwita dzięki dodatkom. Polecam szczególnie:
Dom Myśliwski – w DLC znajdziecie miejsce, w którym możecie zaprezentować swoje trofea. To gratka dla każdego, kto chce pochwalić się swoimi osiągnięciami.
Pies myśliwski – nieoceniona pomoc przy szukaniu postrzelonej zwierzyny. Nawet w najtrudniejszych warunkach pies szybko odnajdzie ślad.
Jeśli myślicie o dłuższej przygodzie z grą, inwestycja w DLC jest naprawdę warta swojej ceny.
Nie macie DLC? Żaden problem możecie dołączyć do rezerwatu znajomego lub innego gracza online. Wspólne polowania to świetna zabawa, a jeśli gospodarz opuści grę, macie około 15 minut na zakończenie sesji. To idealne rozwiązanie, żeby wypróbować nowe rezerwaty przed zakupem. Polecam i do zobaczenia na serwerze!

185886323.review:
I bought this game on a whim when it was on sale for $3, as I feel most players do. What started as a random game I was willing to try out turned into one of my favourite games of all time and a real-life fondness for everything outdoorsy. While it is a hunting sandbox, it doesn't suffer from the same "what do I do now" dilemma that many sandboxes have. You'll always be chasing that next trophy. Definitely give this game a try.
DLCs expand your experience in a worthwhile way. While there's something to say about the amount of DLCs this game has, I'd argue they're worth the price when on sale. If you're brand new, get the ATV, tripods, tents, and the bloodhound, along with a weapons pack of your choosing and whichever pack has the digital caller. Or, be like me and play vanilla for 40 hours, wondering why anyone bothers to use anything other than the .243 soft-point bullets. Up to you.

Better cough up some real USD otherwise you're getting 5 guns and 10 animals to hunt. If the game was F2P the DLC's wouldnt be so outrageous, but the content you get in the base game is NOT worth anywhere near $20. 

The game is bugged to hell and there is no way to showcase your kills without, you guessed it, buying the Cabin DLC, and if you want to decorate your cabin post purchase, guess what? CABIN WALLPAPER DLC! THERES LIKE 10 OF THEM!

The game is fun if you have friends but the devs are scumbags, and I refuse to give them any more money than what they have already fleeced me out of.

185782091.review:
This game is alright, though if you don't have anyone to play with. There's no way of having fun.

First off: The DLCs.

The amount of DLCs in this game are the most ridiculous things I've ever seen.. Buying a car? DLC. Having a dog? DLC. Every single thing is a DLC. The base map that you get for free is horrible.

The Cars:

Out of all the games I have played that include cars, this is the absolute. worst. Maximum speed at 50 KM/H, worst handling I've ever seen. Roblox games are better than this.


The Maps:

Now I've only tried Emerald Coast, but wow every single house and outpost is just the same asset used over and over again. The animals kill you when you're nowhere near them (probably isn't a problem only withemerald coast). And the picture of the house on the steam page of it is absolutely misleading and they do this on purpose.


My opinions:

This game is an absolute cashgrab. 

They make it so you have no way of playing except for just buying the DLC since walking is the slowest thing I'd ever seen.

Do not buy this game if you're planning on spending your money on the base game and not DLCs.

185766403.review:
Bestes erhältliches Outdoor-Erlebnis derzeit mit einer großen Varietät an Karten, Tieren, Waffen und Zubehör. Stressfreies Gameplay, bei dem alles genau in der Geschwindigkeit abläuft, die man möchte. Nicht selten genieße ich hier einfach nur die Ruhe im Spiel und beobachte.

Einzige Kritik gilt dem Abfeuern der Waffen selbst, das kann m.E. der Konkurrent" Way of the Hunter" besser. Auch die Auswertung der Treffer ist dort besser gelöst. Alles andere ist aus meiner Sicht in Call of the Wild besser.

Ich hoffe die Entwickler halten noch eine Weile an der Entwicklung fest, ein weiteres ATV wäre schön, oder noch besser, eine Motocross-Maschine ;)
Mit den vielen DLCs habe ich persönlich kein Problem - es ist klar dass 90 Mitarbeiter irgendwie bezahlt werden müssen.

好游戏！！  画面真心好，再就是优化我的办公本都可以运行，虽然帧数低但是对于我来说够用了，游戏机制，动物寻路，踪迹显示都很好但是有的时候还是会出现踪迹莫名奇妙的断了，不知道是我没找到还是出bug了。游戏最大的问题是dlc，像三脚架、电子哨、枪械、夜视套、猎犬这些提升游戏体验的应该是dlc的内容，我也愿意去购买，但是像帐篷这种还有车最起码应该给个基础的吧，不买车可以说是坐牢开图，老玩家可能不太需要但是新手的话车子很重要，没有帐篷就是回哨站坐牢然后重新发配边疆。

希望能享受这款游戏而不是为了升等级而去玩！！！！

185696063.review:
Tak kde začít - theHunter: Call of the Wild není pro netrpělivé hráče, to musím zdůraznit, není to žádná střílečka kam naběhnete vystřílíte všechnu zvěř, shrábnete peníze za maso a koupíte si lepší vybavení. Je to o pečlivém plánování, čtení stop, stopování, plížení popř. plazení až k vytoužené odměně za nejlépe do srdce střelené zvíře. Je to simulátor, takže zvířata se opravdu chovají jako živá, takže sebemenší zvuk při průchodu křovím je vyplaší a potom už se špatně loví při běhu, kdy musíte mířit ve směru pohybu zvířete s prodlevou, jinak minete a  špatně střelené zvíře můžete stopovat podle loužiček krve i několik km, než zemře. Proto je to hra velice zdlouhavá a není problém nahrát třeba 500 hod. Pokud za tu dobu připadne mapa někomu okoukaná, hra má za svoji dobu 9 let nespočet DLC s novými mapami a s novými druhy divoké zvěře. Hra skýtá i několik velice vzácných úspěchů - jako, že je odemknulo pouze 0,4 % hráčů ze 100. Zmíním dva nejvzácnější, 10 ran do srdce lukem Alexandr (DLC Silver Ridge Peaks) a dokončit všechny vedlejší úkoly v DLC Quarto Colinas, což také není jednoduché, protože hráč musí na závěr ulovit zvíře s diamantovým hodnocením, nejvíce možným, což se mi podařilo zatím pouze 2X.  Takže je to určitá výzva, kterou mě plnit bavilo nejvíc na hře.

Zápory:
- Stopy, jsou všude a někdy je to velice nepřehledné, pokud míjíte zóny potřeb zvěře, nebo stopujete stádo a přitom ještě lovíte jiný druh, aktivní stopy se přepínají (podle toho co zpozorujete dalekohledem) a po té už nedovedete dost dobře sledovat původní stopu, řešil bych to 2 aktivními stopami, jedny pro pozorování a jedny pro stopování  odlišené jinou barvou.
- Zvuky při průchodu některé trávy, zvuk jako by se zasekne a nejde se ho zbavit, i když už je postava mimo porost.
- Zaseknutá zvěř o terén (většinou příkré svahy), ne, že by mě to vadilo, kolikrát mi to pomohlo ulovit zvíře, ale kazí to inteligenci zvířat a celkový dojem při hraní.
- Při jízdě v ATV zvěř nejde zranit, spíš ona zraní vás, což je dost trapné a nereálné.
- Balistika zbraní taky není nejlepší, do 200 metrů trefíte všechno přesně, pokud to není v pohybu a nad 200 metrů musíte navyšovat optiku v puškoměru pro zásah a počítat se zpožděním.
- Výdaje peněz za postavení úkrytu, nebo posedu, výdaje za nocleh.
- Chybějící animace některých činností, kde je klasicky černá obrazovka, chybějící NPC (jediná postava ve hře jste pouze vy).
- Chybějící fotorežim.
- Žádná, nebo skoro žádná hudba.

Klady:
- Dechberoucí grafika některých scenérií, zejména při východu a západu slunce
- Pestrobarevné, rozdílné mapy i biotopy při koupi různých DLC (všechny kontinenty).
- Získávání bodů za lov pro koupi lepšího vybavení (není možné mít všechno od začátku hry, pokud nevlastníte DLC).
- RPG systém pro rozdělování bodů do oblasti schopností a perků a možnost si je za poplatek resetovat (není možné mít všechny schopnosti najednou a max. level je 60).
- Inteligentní divoká zvěř (zvíře pozoruje, větří, prchá, vábí), každé zvíře má jiné chování a jiné časy zóny potřeb.
- Mnoho druhů zbraní a vybavení, včetně vábniček.
- Sbírání sběratelských předmětů.
- Možnost preparace za poplatek a výstavy nejlepších ulovených trofejí ve výstavních boudách (nutno DLC).
- České titulky.
- Z fotoaparátu jdou fotky rovnou do knihovny steam, kde si je můžete upravovat a sdílet (snadno si potom můžete procházet příběhové momenty).
- Pokud máte s kým hrát je možnost lovit ve více hráčích a to nemusíte vlastnit ani DLC stačí, když ho bude mít host, pouze nejde plnit příběhové úkoly.
 
Tato hra mě zprvu odradila pro její náročnost a nepochopení chování zvěře, ale vrátil jsem se k ní po několika letech a můžu říct, že mě napodruhé příjemně překvapila, ať už množstvím DLC, nebo již zmiňovanou inteligencí zvířat a získanými zkušenostmi s hraní. Vřele doporučuji pro lidi, kdo milují tento sport.

185695278.review:
Don't even bother. The animals are stupid, and every weapon is like a peashooter. Not only that, but it's impossible to sneak in this game. Your character is so loud and will most likely scare game off before you can see it, even at a slow walking pace, walking into the wind.

The animals will flee before you can see them, usually while they're 100-200 yds away. This is because it's impossible to move quietly at a decent pace in this game. In real life you can easily walk within shooting distance of a whitetail, yet in this game it is impossible. 

The guns are so incredibly weak as well. A perfect shot from a .270 should drop a whitetail where it stands. However, they usually run like 50-100 yards. A .22 won't be able to kill a coyote while it easily can in real life.

Honestly just a poor hunting experience. 0 stars. 

By the way I might only have 2 hours on steam, but I played this game a lot on xbox. I quit.

185605723.review:
If you're a fan of hunting games, this title sets a new standard with its breathtaking visuals and lifelike mechanics. The game immerses you in sprawling, beautifully rendered environments that feel alive, from dense forests to open plains. Every detail, from the rustling leaves to the way animals move and react, is crafted with precision.

The realistic mechanics elevate the experience, requiring players to consider wind direction, animal behavior, and even the sound of their footsteps. It's not just about shooting; it's about strategy, patience, and skill. Whether you're tracking a deer or lining up a perfect shot, the tension feels palpable.

With its stunning graphics and attention to detail, this game offers an unparalleled hunting simulation that both enthusiasts and casual gamers will appreciate. A must-try for anyone looking for a truly immersive outdoor adventure!

185576886.review:
目前主程式的兩個地區已經快通關了，
燒了720小時...
鑽石級也只捕獲到黑雁。

這遊戲怎麼說呢...
新手教學很爛，有等於沒有。
你要學著注意以下事項

1. 不要隨便站著跑，除非你要開圖(前哨站&瞭望塔)，不然不要開車 & 站著跑動
那個噪音跟顯眼度會在 200~300米外，就嚇跑你所有獵物。

2. 注意小樹叢或是茂密的樹下，蹲在內讓眼睛閉起來(顯眼度最低)，獵物要10米內才能發現你，善用仿生哨把獵物吸引過來。

3. 請拿出你的耳機，左右聲道會很明顯聽到獵物踩草的腳步以及通過樹叢的聲音，可以藉此聽出牠要從哪個方向走過來。

4. 基本上如果用走路的方式 300米外大多數動物絕對不會發現你。有遮蔽物，獵物難度越高獵物發現你的距離大概是130米~180米，距離越遠，難度越高；距離越近，難度越低。

5. 如果要追獵，跑到200米左右就要開始蹲下，因此全程蹲著快走，靠近100米左右後就要趴下了。

6. 在空地用槍射擊，會增加大量的狩獵壓力，一個地區打滿三隻基本上就要換地方了，打到第四隻會產生死亡級的壓力，會導致獵物全部避開那個地區並且消滅居住地(進食、飲水、休息)。

7. 如果想要埋伏在一個地區大量狩獵，建議找個埋伏建築住進去，如果沒有埋伏建築可用，持弓也會有相同的效果，但持弓射擊的距離很近，難度也很高。

8. 等級太低，太菜要賺錢，就去打大雁 & 鴨子，打起來很爽很有成就感。

185510899.review:
Prepare-se para uma experiência que vai muito além de um simples jogo de caça: "The Hunter: Call of the Wild" é uma verdadeira imersão na natureza selvagem. Com biomas incrivelmente detalhados e uma fauna diversa, o jogo faz você sentir o vento entre as árvores, o barulho das folhas sob seus pés e a emoção de rastrear uma presa. Seja na vastidão de uma savana ou nas florestas densas de um vale montanhoso, cada momento é uma dança entre a paciência e a adrenalina – até chegar à tão aguardada cartuchada, o ápice de toda caçada.

E é isso que torna este jogo tão único: mesmo com a infinidade de animais e biomas, sempre haverá uma criatura que se destacará, merecedora de sua atenção e, claro, de uma cartuchada certeira. A satisfação de alinhar o disparo perfeito, sentindo o impacto de cada decisão, transforma cada encontro em um momento memorável. "The Hunter: Call of the Wild" não é só um jogo; é uma celebração da natureza, da estratégia e, acima de tudo, da arte inconfundível da cartuchada bem dada!

So good I bought it a second time for my Xbox in the other room.

185504490.review:
在游戏的浩瀚宇宙中，《猎人：荒野的召唤》宛如一颗璀璨的明珠，散发着独特的魅力，吸引着无数热爱自然与挑战的玩家投身其中。它不仅仅是一款游戏，更像是一次心灵与自然的深度对话，一场与野性的亲密邂逅。
 
当我踏入这片广袤的荒野，仿佛被一股神秘的力量所牵引，瞬间沉浸在它那如诗如画的世界里。郁郁葱葱的森林、广袤无垠的草原、雄伟壮丽的山脉，每一处景色都细腻逼真，仿佛一幅流动的画卷。清晨，阳光透过树叶的缝隙洒在地面上，形成一片片金色的光斑，鸟儿在枝头欢快地歌唱，仿佛在为新的一天欢呼；傍晚，夕阳的余晖将天空染成了橙红色，远处的山峦在余晖的映照下显得更加雄伟壮观，让人不禁陶醉在这大自然的美景之中。
 
在游戏中，狩猎不再是简单的射击行为，而是一场充满智慧与耐心的较量。每一种动物都有其独特的行为模式和习性，需要我们用心去观察、去了解。当我追踪着猎物的踪迹，小心翼翼地靠近它们时，那种紧张而又兴奋的感觉让我心跳加速。我会根据风向调整自己的位置，避免被猎物察觉；我会利用周围的环境，寻找最佳的射击角度。每一次成功的狩猎，都不仅仅是收获了猎物，更是对自己狩猎技巧的一次肯定，一种无法言喻的成就感油然而生。
 
游戏中的武器和装备种类丰富多样，每一种都有其独特的特点和用途。从精准的步枪到灵活的手枪，从威力巨大的霰弹枪到悄无声息的弓箭，我可以根据不同的狩猎场景和猎物选择合适的武器。而各种辅助装备，如望远镜、仿声哨、气味喷剂等，更是为我的狩猎之旅增添了更多的可能性。当我手持武器，穿梭在荒野之中时，仿佛自己真的成为了一名经验丰富的猎人，肩负着探索自然、征服野性的使命。
 
多人模式的加入，让游戏的乐趣得到了进一步的提升。我可以与朋友们一起组队，共同探索这片神秘的荒野，分享彼此的狩猎经验和心得。我们会在狩猎过程中相互配合，分工明确，有的负责追踪猎物，有的负责寻找最佳射击位置，有的负责掩护。当我们成功猎杀一只大型猎物时，那种团队协作带来的喜悦和成就感是无法用言语来形容的。我们还可以在游戏中互相竞争，看谁的狩猎技巧更高超，谁能获得更多的战利品。这种合作与竞争并存的模式，让游戏充满了更多的乐趣和挑战。
 
《猎人：荒野的召唤》不仅仅是一款娱乐游戏，它还让我对自然有了更深的敬畏之心。在游戏中，我亲身体验到了大自然的美丽与残酷，感受到了生命的脆弱与顽强。每一只动物都是大自然的一部分，它们都有自己的生存方式和价值。我们在狩猎的同时，也应该尊重它们的生命，保护好这片美丽的荒野。这款游戏让我意识到，人与自然是一个和谐共生的整体，我们应该珍惜和保护我们赖以生存的自然环境。

185496928.review:
Hunter: Call of the Wild is the perfect mix of peaceful nature walks and screaming, “WHY DID THAT DEER RUN?!” after tracking it for an hour. It’s stunningly realistic, from the sound of rustling leaves to the crushing disappointment of missing an easy shot.

The maps are gorgeous, and the animals? Smarter than you. You’ll spend more time following tracks and debating wind direction than actually shooting, but when you finally bag that trophy buck? Pure serotonin.

Multiplayer is where the chaos really shines. Whether it’s your buddy scaring off a moose or “accidentally” shooting your ATV, it’s a hilarious mess every time.

If you love gorgeous scenery, epic hunts, and occasional frustration-induced laughter, Hunter: Call of the Wild will keep you hooked. Just don’t blame the animals—they’re smarter than they look.

indétrônable simulateur de chasse depuis 2017, il mériterais d'être retravaillé sur certains points(comme l'ajout un multijoueur avec de vrais objectifs, des lunettes de visée et une balistique revisitées), mais dans l'ensemble il est plus profond et complet que tous les autres simulateurs de chasse.

l'IA des animaux peut être imprévisible et plus basée sur l'aléatoire que sur d'autres simulateurs de chasse ou j'ai posé la main, le comportement est vraiment différent d'une espèce à l'autre.

c'est un jeu qui va vous demander de la patience et de la préparation selon le gibier que vous chasserez.

185477471.review:
Игра, где ты охотишься, но в итоге природа охотится на твое терпение.

Это симулятор охоты, который заставляет почувствовать себя профессионалом... или туристом, который просто забыл компас. Великолепные пейзажи, от густых лесов до заснеженных равнин, иногда настолько завораживают, что ты забываешь, зачем сюда пришел.

Охота здесь — это не просто "выстрелил и готово". Сначала ты ищешь следы, потом слушаешь звуки, а в конце ползёшь на карачках за добычей, как будто это твоя единственная надежда на ужин. А когда наконец подкрался, зверь или тебя учуял, или внезапно решил соревноваться в беге.

185440748.developer_response:
Hey GlitterUnicorn!

Thank you for your review.

We’re sorry to hear you’re frustrated with some aspects of the game. The dog and vehicle are optional features designed to enhance gameplay, but they aren’t required to succeed. You can still make progress with basic equipment.

The slower pace and realistic animal behavior are intentional to create a more immersive hunting experience, though we understand it can be challenging at first. The terrain and binoculars are meant to encourage strategic planning and careful observation.

We value your thoughts and are always looking for ways to improve the balance between core content and additional options.

If you have any suggestions or ideas for improvement that you'd like to share with us, we'll be happy to hear from you at: https://support.thehunter.com/hc/en-us/requests/new.

185264708.review:
[h3]If you enjoy hunting, go hunting.
If you enjoy gaming, go gaming.
Don't try to do both with this game.[/h3]

[b]Technical issues[/b] were minimal. I got stuck in a door frame within 5 minutes of starting the game. Otherwise the game ran fine. No lagging or crashes. After my initial door frame issues the game ran great.

Despite that, the game itself was not all that entertaining.

*[b]The intro tutorial[/b] was not helpful in getting you familiar with anything. There were no key binding hints. No descriptions of the how the animal classifications, firearms, or other tools worked. There was simply a task given, go find animal tracks. What do they look like? How will I know them when I find them? Where do I look? Not even a good luck, just go.

*[b]The narration[/b] was neither helpful nor plausible. A strange voice comes over the radio with instructions for you. Where is this radio? Don't worry. It's with all that other helpful stuff they never give you. Oh, but you do get a GPS that offers you missions (somehow) and acts as a minimap, so there's that.

*[b]Gameplay:[/b] get ready to walk, a lot. Not sure what to shoot? just pick something I guess. Where do it hit it? Well I hope you've been hunting before, because we have no intention of telling you. What do I shoot it with. Doesn't really matter. You'll either kill it with one hit or just wound it and never find it again. Or in my case, hit it point blank 5 times and have it trample you. Don't worry though, you'll get another chance to walk around aimlessly trying to unlock the random hunting blinds, cabins, and "animal needs" locations spread throughout a giant map that you might revisit one day.

185132773.review: Mucho más frenético que su predecesor, el theHunter Classic, es un juego más arcade en el que puedes depender totalmente del dinero que ganas cazando animales y haciendo misiones de las campañas de los mapas, las cuales tienen una duración moderada, pero sin duda alguna son muy buenas. Los modelos son muy buenos, las físicas son buenas, y las armas muy vistosas, pero la densidad de animales es muy alta. El juego es relativamente fácil y amigable con los que acaban de empezar, pero incluso si digo que es rápido, un tiro mal dado puede suponer una persecución de 4 h. Por otra parte, el juego es visualmente precioso, pero puede ponerse cuesta arriba para ordenadores con menos rendimiento. Si quieres una experiencia de caza más real y la paciencia acorde, recomiendo el theHunter Classic, pero si quieres disfrutar una experiencia más intensa y algo más fácil, este es tu juego.

185090016.review:
地图很多很大，有动态天气、完整日夜循环，以及的风向系统。

游戏试图打造真实的狩猎流程，玩家可通过动物叫声、动物踪迹去进行猎物的追踪搜寻。不同动物有各自的活动区域与行为模式，玩家需要根据动物的习性和环境条件，选择合适的武器、制定策略，追踪、引诱、伏击猎物。但也正因如此游戏过程较为硬核，需要玩家花费大量时间去追踪猎物、寻找合适的射击位置等，对于一些喜欢快节奏游戏的玩家来说，可能会觉得比较枯燥。

游戏优化一般，更新频率高，但DLC太多，并且很多都没用，性价比不高。

喜欢慢节奏的狩猎游戏爱好者可以尝试。

初级猎人：打一枪驼鹿追半天血迹追到伤口愈合，看着满地的动物粪便惆怅。
中级猎人：配好子弹打正确的脑部位置或者心脏一枪倒。
高级猎人：看好饮水时间，在沼泽哨站等一大群鹿过来，注意自己的气味和风向。
冒险猎人：潜行到熊的附近用弓箭，在扑过来的瞬间贯穿心脏。

游戏硬核且沉浸，自己探索打猎或者是观景都别有一番风味，非洲篇DLC很推荐，剧情和打猎融合的很好。关于人、灵、 生态保护的思考比较有深度。

185021679.review:
Its a good game about hunting ( no shit sherlock ) that can get you hooked the moment you get it. Just the feeling of that heart shot, harvesting an diamond, getting your first great one ( which i have yet to achieve ) is insanely good. Only complaint, without DLC's this game is gonna bore you around 30 hours playtime. Not unplayable boreness, its still fun, but a lot less than the moment you got it. I reccomend getting this on sale, dropped to around 2 bucks and 14 cents the recent sale. Make sure to get atleat 1 DLC whetever its a weapon pack, the vehicle thingy pack, but i heavily insist that you buy a new map with ALL new species (No moose, no whitetail, no fellow deer, completely new animals that youve never seen before, except if  you love an animal in a map with other species youve seen) which can easily be seen from the wiki of the game. Overall, its worth your money.

If youre a non-DLC player, hirschfielden is the best map because you can just get onto the corn fields and animals will be resting, eating or just walking around in PLAIN sight. And every animal does it; whetever its the european bison, canada goose, fellow deer etc. The only ones i havent seen on corn fields is the european rabbit.

My reccomended DLCs : 

Vurongha Savanna (Great story and animals, the only africa map)

Emerald coast (Fucking kangroos and saltwater crocs how more insane can it get?)

Tree stands & tripods (Honestly needs to be base game items. In one of these bad boys you can hunt 16 animals instead of 3 in a need zone before you risk losing the zone.)

Ambusher pack (Great crossbow even tho i fucking hate bows, rifle isnt all that bad and its also free so great for beginners, the highlight is the electronic caller which has a call for every callable animal (American alligator that doesnt have an call in-game can be called with this)) 

Yukon Valley (Great animals, grizzly bear is definetly a highlight, also areas with low vegetation, and grey wolves add onto it.)

Jogaria muito mais horas se fosse possível obter o 100% de skill points...

184959211.review:
The Hunter: Call of the Wild

"The Hunter: Call of the Wild" ist ein beeindruckendes Jagdspiel, das mich in seinen Bann gezogen hat. Die Grafik ist einfach atemberaubend und schafft eine unglaublich realistische Atmosphäre. Die detailreichen Landschaften und die Lebendigkeit der Natur sind ein wahres Meisterwerk, was das Spiel zu einem visuellen Genuss macht.

Das Gameplay ist ebenfalls hervorragend und bietet eine tiefgehende Jagderfahrung. Ich habe wirklich zig Stunden in diesem Spiel verbracht und es wurde nie langweilig. Die verschiedenen Tiere, das Verhalten der Wildtiere und die abwechslungsreichen Jagdgebiete sorgen für eine spannende und fesselnde Erfahrung. Es gibt auch nur sehr wenige Bugs, was das gesamte Spielerlebnis angenehm und störungsfrei macht.

Natürlich gibt es immer Raum für Verbesserungen. Eine Idee, die ich sehr begrüßen würde, wären Funktionen, die man aus der echten Jagd kennt, wie zum Beispiel das Anlegen von Wildäckern, das Benutzen von Wärmebildkameras. Diese Features würden die Jagd noch realistischer und strategischer machen und den Spielspaß weiter erhöhen.

Was ebenfalls sehr hilfreich wäre, ist die Möglichkeit, eine VR-Brille in Verbindung mit einem Controller in Form eines Gewehrs zu verwenden. Das würde das Spielerlebnis auf ein ganz neues Level heben und die Jagd noch immersiver gestalten.

Insgesamt ist "The Hunter: Call of the Wild" ein herausragendes Spiel, das sowohl durch seine Grafik als auch durch das tiefgründige Gameplay besticht. Wer auf Jagdspiele steht, wird hier definitiv auf seine Kosten kommen.

개인적으론 이 게임이 몰입감 있고 상당히 재미있습니다.

한글 미 지원이라 영어 울렁증 있는 저에겐 상당히 힘들었습니다.

初期ライフルでヘラジカの頭(眉間)を数メートルの距離で５発６発撃っても死なない。銃が弱すぎるのか、ヘッドショットの概念がないのかはわからない。
剥製というシステムがあるためそもそも頭を撃つことが想定されていないのかもしれないが、(チュートリアルでは心臓、肺を撃てと言っていた)ライフルで頭を撃って死なないのはとても萎えた。
最初は当たり判定が小さいのかも、と思っていたがひるんでいるし出血しているのであたってはいるはず。なぜ死なない？
痕跡を探し、獲物を発見、そこから匍匐で近づいていき、発砲。この時間のかかってしょうがない一連の流れを断ち切るような鋼鉄のヘラジカ、頭撃たれているのに全力疾走。もう笑うしかない。

追記：録画を確認したところライフル４発、ショットガン４発でした。いずれもヘッドショットです。

184720895.review: Очень сильно затягивающий симулятор охоты, где каждый зверек у тебя на счету. Где сможешь просто погулять, оглянуться, (покурить), а потом застрелить надоедливого кабана, который 24 на 7 смотрит на тебя. Конечно, если кабанчики вам надоели, то можно поехать в крокодилью тусовку и тупо по кайфу в них пострелять. Вы должны четко понимать, что ваше оружие-это настоящий инструмент, которым нужно уметь пользоваться. Представьте себе такой момент, когда сантехник приходит к вам с починкой, а у него с собой неподходящий набор инструментов, так как понятия не имел, в какую хату заходить, и взял не то что надо. Каждый элемент игры продуман до мелочей. Здесь не просто гуляешь по живописным локациям – природа создаёт уникальную атмосферу. Вы чувствуете себя как настоящий охотник, когда слышите шорохи в траве или глухие звуки, исходящие из глубины леса. Каждый животный имеет свои повадки и привычки, и вам предстоит изучить их, чтобы успешно провести охоту. Смотрите, вы понимаете, что хотите застрелить какого-то биома с бриллиантом, и вы постепенно начинаете изучать ареал, его повадки, привычки, особенности поведения, и также поиск его следов. Для хорошего результата придется очень сильно вложиться, так как еще есть характеристики, которые указывают на сколько вы правильно подошли к добыче данного трофея. За это всё время, все руки потные, лицо..... из-за какого-то тупого оленя, который вам гребет мозги-вот это реальное удовольствие. И громко и крича.... орешь... "Я ДОСТАНУ ЭТОГО ОЛЕНЯ, ПОКА МАЛЫШКА НЕ ПОЛУЧИТ УДОВОЛЬСТВИЯ!!!!!" и все твои соседи это слышут на готове взять трубку телефона и вызвать в полночь дурку. Смотря на это всё, понимаешь, ты получаешь настоящее удовольствие и игровой оргазм..., которое ни один симулятор такого не доставит!

184695722.review:
I'm closing in on the 1000 hour mark in this game. So this isn't a played briefly review. I also don't hunt in real life. When this game was first recommended to me by a friend, I threw it on my wish list. About a year later I was looking for something new to play during a Steam sale and decided to finally get it. Suffice to say I have played this game a lot. It's a lot of fun. Does it have some issues? Sure. Are they easily overlooked because the game is so great and engaging. Absolutely. 
Pros:
-Satisfies my FPS itch without multiplayer sweatfests.
-Beautiful graphics for an almost 8 year old game. There's also been graphics updates throughout the years to spruce them up, as well. And since there's an ingame 24 hour clock, you can watch some beautiful sunsets and sunrises. 
-Multiple updates throughout the year to keep the game feeling fresh.
-Copious amounts of guns, bows, and equipment that allow you to hunt the way you want. Bolt action or semi auto rifles. Double barrel, pump, semi auto shotguns. A drilling rifle. Compound, recurve, or crossbows. Pistols. Modern and old school black powder. You can hunt whatever way you want.
-To the previous comment above, you also can tailor you hunt to what you want to do. You can just walk around and shoot whatever comes along. You can sit in a blind or treestand and use callers to draw in your animal of choice. You can set up a duck or goose blind. Some people don't even hunt the animals. They try to sneak in close and use the camera feature to capture wildlife photos. 
-Customization of the HUD allows you to see (or not see) what you want. Some players even like to go hardcore and turn off everything. Making it feel as realistic as possible. But you can also leave everything on for a more arcade experience. Once again, this allows you to play the game the way you want.
-Copious amounts of maps (see also the cons to touch on this). No matter where you are from, you can probably find a map that's close to the hunting in your area. On the flip side, if you want a more exotic experience, there are maps for that as well. Every continent but Antarctica is represented at least once. Also, every map comes with missions with their own narrator, so you have a native of that area walking you through those missions, adding to the immersion, instead of the same voiceover every time.
-Every map has something called "initial spawns". That is, when you play a map for the first time, the game will spawn in a few trophy animals of diamond rating and some rare fur types. So you know there is something on your maps worth putting in a trophy lodge.
-Conservation themes throughout the many missions on the maps. This game isn't just about killing animals, but teaching people why hunting is important to the overall health of our natural environment. 

Cons (these are minor complaints, but listing for full transparency):
-This game has come a long way since it base version, and due to the copious amounts of equipment added through DLC afterward, the UI for the inventory system could use a QoL overhaul to make it easier to find what you're looking for. There's definitely a learning curve when you're trying to get a loadout set up because of this.
-It's a game that's had a lot of DLC added over the better part of a decade. This obviously can make buying the complete game a bit costly. I recommend that if you aren't made of money (you know, most of us) that you wait for Steam sales to buy DLC.
-The two original maps that come with the game are two of the more difficult maps to hunt. If you just buy the base game and are feeling frustrated, I would recommend to buy the DLC map Silver Ridge Peaks. It's one of the easiest maps to hunt and it has a nice spread of animals all over it. If I didn't buy this map along with the base game I don't know that I would've stuck with this game as long as I have. 
-This game does have missions to get you used to it, but it isn't a tutorial heavy map that holds your hand. So there is a bit of a steep learning curve at first. Youtube, Reddit, Discord, and the like will be a big help in learning the ropes. 
-Multiplayer can be a nightmare. Modders can load maps with only trophy animals, giving people dishonest trophies. There's nothing you can do to deal with griefers. If I host a map, I'll boot BM players, but not everyone will. The only thing you can do is back out and hope you don't load into that map again. Reporting players seems to do absolutely nothing. The MP experience isn't very well regulated when it comes to modders and griefers. You can meet some really cool people and have some great experiences, though. It's not all bad.

184666955.review:
theHunter : Call of the Wild

Story
theHunter: Call of the Wild ไม่ได้มีเนื้อเรื่องที่ชัดเจน เกมจะให้คุณรับบทเป็นนักล่าสัตว์ในพื้นที่ธรรมชาติอันกว้างใหญ่ โดยสามารถเลือกทำภารกิจที่เกี่ยวกับการล่าสัตว์หรือสำรวจโลก open world ตามใจชอบ เกมมีการบอกเล่าเรื่องราวของพื้นที่และธรรมชาติผ่านข้อความและเสียงบรรยาย ซึ่งช่วยเพิ่มความรู้สึกเหมือนกำลังสำรวจธรรมชาติจริง ๆ

Presentation
กราฟิคของเกมนี้นับว่าเป็นตัวชูโรงได้เลย ด้วยการออกแบบโลกที่สมจริง ทั้งแสงเงา ทิวทัศน์ และสภาพแวดล้อมที่หลากหลาย เช่น ป่าเขียวชอุ่ม ทุ่งหญ้ากว้างใหญ่ และภูเขาหิมะ เสียงเอฟเฟคต์ของสัตว์และธรรมชาติมีความ immersive ราวกับได้อยู่ในสถานที่จริง แถม UI ของเกมยังใช้งานง่ายและไม่ซับซ้อน

Gameplay
เกมเพลย์เน้นความสมจริง คุณต้องใช้ทักษะการล่าสัตว์ เช่น การแกะรอย การใช้กล้องส่องทางไกล และการเลือกใช้อาวุธที่เหมาะสม เกมนี้ไม่ได้เน้นแอ็คชั่นรวดเร็ว แต่เป็นการล่าที่ต้องใช้ความอดทนและการวางแผน คิดจะเข้ามาวิ่งสับ ๆ แบบ Battlefield หรือ Call of Duty เข้าไปยิงสัตว์ คุณก็ล่าไม่ได้แม้แต่สัตว์คลาสต่ำ ๆ นอกจากนี้ยังมีระบบการอัปเกรดตัวละครและอุปกรณ์ที่ช่วยเพิ่มความหลากหลายในการเล่น

Performance
เหมาะสำหรับ PC สเป็คกลางถึงสูง แต่ในบางพื้นที่ที่มีรายละเอียดเยอะอาจมีอาการเฟรมเรตตกบ้าง หากตั้งค่ากราฟิค ultra สำหรับ PC สเป็คต่ำอาจต้องปรับกราฟิคลงเพื่อให้เล่นได้ลื่นขึ้น

Verdict
theHunter: Call of the Wild เป็นเกมที่เหมาะสำหรับคนที่ชื่นชอบความสมจริงและการสำรวจธรรมชาติ หากคุณกำลังมองหาเกมที่ให้ความรู้สึกผ่อนคลายและท้าทายไปพร้อม ๆ กัน เกมนี้จะไม่ทำให้คุณผิดหวัง แต่สำหรับผู้ที่ชอบเกมที่มีแอ็คชั่นรวดเร็วหรือเนื้อเรื่องเข้มข้น เกมนี้อาจไม่ตอบโจทย์

คะแนน: 8/10
----------
แนะนำแอป COTW Companion โหลดฟรี
----------
แนะนำ DLC น่าซื้อ
----------
แผนที่น่าซื้อ โดยเฉพาะถ้าคุณชอบหรือเน้นล่าสัตว์ใหญ่คลาส 7-9

Sundarpatan Nepal Hunting Reserve
เที่ยวเนปาล ยิง เสือเบงกอล ควายป่า จามรีป่า

Emerald Coast Australia
ก็ออสเตรเลียอะ วัวแดง จิงโจ้ จระเข้น้ำเค็ม นี่ของตาย 555+ โดยเฉพาะ จระเข้น้ำเค็ม เอาไว้ฟาร์มได้เลย

Vurhonga Savanna
ขึ้นชื่อว่า ซาวันน่า สิงโต วิลเดอบีสต์ ควายป่าแอฟริกา ต้องมา แต่ไม่มี ม้าลาย แรด ยีราฟ นะ

Silver Ridge Peaks
ควายไบซันที่ราบ

สัตว์ที่กล่าวถึงข้างต้นเป็นแค่สัตว์คลาส 7-9 แน่นอนว่าในแผนที่ยังมีสัตว์อื่น ๆ อีก

Revontuli Coast (ตัวเลือก)
สำหรับท่านที่ชอบyedเป็ด เอ๊ย ยิงพวกนกน้ำ (เป็ด/ห่าน) เชิญที่นี่เลย แผนที่นี้จะมีสัตว์คลาส 1 จำพวกนี้เยอะมาก และเพื่อการล่าที่สมบูรณ์แบบ อย่าลืม Duck & Cover Pack+Wild Goose Chase Gear ท่านจะเพลิดเพลิน หรรษาและเมามันกับการฟาร์มเป็ดแน่นอน
----------
แพ็คอาวุธและอุปกรณ์ที่แนะนำ (ปกติแพ็คปืนจะมีปืน 3 กระบอก อันไหนไม่ได้กล่าวถึงคือยังไม่เคยใช้/ไม่ชอบใช้) ทั้งนี้สำหรับผู้เล่นใหม่ไม่ค่อยแนะนำ DLC แพ็คปืนเก่า ๆ เท่าไหร่ เพราะปืนที่ออกใหม่ส่วนใหญ่จะดีกว่าของเก่า ผมเองก็ซื้อ DLC แพ็คปืนเก่า ๆ ไว้นานแล้วแต่ไม่ได้เล่นซะที สุดท้ายก็ต้องมาซื้อแพ็คใหม่อีก

Modern Rifle Pack (แนะนำ)
1. ZARZA-15 .22LR (AR-15)
ปืนไรเฟิลยิงสัตว์คลาส 1

2. ZARZA-15 .223 (M16)
ปืนไรเฟิลยิงสัตว์คลาส 2-4

3. ZARZA-10 .308 (AR-10)
ปืนไรเฟิลยิงสัตว์คลาส 5-8

High Caliber Weapon Pack (แนะนำ)
1. ARZYNA .300 MAG TACTICAL 
ปืนไรเฟิลยิงสัตว์คลาส 7-9 ที่พอฟัดพอเหวี่ยงกับ VALLGARDA .375 ใน  Bolt-Action Rifle Pack แต่ส่วนตัวคิดว่า ARZYNA ใช้งานสะดวกกว่า

2. .45-70 JERNBERG SUPERIOR
ปืนพกยิงสัตว์คลาส 4-9 มีดีที่ความแรง น้ำหนักเบาและติดสโคปปืนไรเฟิลได้ แต่จุกระสุนได้แค่นัดเดียว ใครอยากเอาปืนพกไปยิงสัตว์ใหญ่ต้องกระบอกนี้เลย

3. STRANDBERG 10SA EXECUTIVE
ปืนลูกซองที่ยิงสัตว์ได้ตั้งแต่คลาส 1-2, 4-9 ใช้กระสุน 10 GA ได้ 3 แบบคือ Birdshot สำหรับยิงสัตว์คลาส 1-2, Buckshot สำหรับยิงสัตว์คลาส 4-7 และ Slug สำหรับยิงสัตว์คลาส 6-9 ข้อเสียเพียงอย่างเดียวของปืนกระบอกนี้คือด้วยความที่เป็นปืนลูกซองต้องยิงใกล้ ๆ นี่แหละ

Weapon Pack 1 (ตัวเลือก) 
VIRANT .22LR (Marlin Model 795)
ปืนไรเฟิลยิงสัตว์คลาส 1 อารมณ์ ZARZA-15 .22LR ที่บรรจุกระสุนได้เยอะกว่า สเตตัสห่วยกว่านิดหน่อยแต่ใช้แทนกันได้

Weapon Pack 3 (ตัวเลือก)
ANDERSSON .22LR (Ruger Mark II)

Bolt-Action Rifle Pack (ตัวเลือก+ความชอบส่วนตัว)
แพ็คปืนไรเฟิลแบบลูกเลื่อน เด่นที่ VALLGARDA .375 ปืนยิงสัตว์คลาส 7-9 ที่แรงสุดในเกม แรงกว่า ระยะหวังผลดีกว่า และแรงถีบเยอะกว่า ARZYNA .300 MAG TACTICAL ไม่เหมาะสำหรับยิงสัตว์เป็นฝูง

หรือถ้าไม่อยากซื้อแพ็คปืน DLC อยากใช้แค่ปืนในเกมก็ได้ (เน้นปืนไรเฟิล) เช่น

ปืนไรเฟิลยิงสัตว์คลาส 4-9 (ราคา 48000 ต้องการแต้มปืนไรเฟิล 2800)

ปืนลูกซองยิงสัตว์คลาส 1-8 ใช้กระสุน 12GA (ราคา 48000 ต้องการแต้มปืนลูกซอง 1150)

อันนี้เป็นแค่บางส่วน ในเกมยังมีปืนที่ไม่ต้องซื้อ DLC หลายกระบอก บางคนชอบลูกซอง บางคนชอบปืนพก ต้องลองเล่นเอง
----------
อุปกรณ์ต่าง ๆ

ATV Saber 4x4 (แนะนำ)
ไว้ขับชมวิว เปิดแผนที่ ไม่เหมาะกับการล่าสัตว์อย่างแรง เพราะเสียงโคตรดัง ระยะน่าจะประมาณ 500 เมตร สัตว์หนีไปครึ่งป่าแล้ว

Tent & Ground Blind (แนะนำ)
แพ็คนี้จะเน้นใช้งานเต็นท์มากกว่า เพราะสามารถใช้เป็นจุด Fast Travel ซื้อของ เปลี่ยนอุปกรณ์ ของสวมใส่ นอนเพื่อ skip เวลาได้ ส่วน Ground Blind ใช้เพื่อซุ่มยิงสัตว์และมีผลลด Hunting Pressure ตอนยิงสัตว์

Treestand & Tripod Pack (แนะนำ)
ห้างส่อง/ยิงสัตว์ และขาตั้งสำหรับส่อง/ยิงสัตว์ มีผลลด Hunting Pressure ตอนยิงสัตว์เหมือนกับ Ground Blind

Scope & Crosshair Pack (ตัวเลือก)
แพ็คสโคปสำหรับปืนไรเฟิล ปืนพกและลูกซอง รวมถึงสโคป Night Vision ส่วนตัวคิดว่าสโคปที่มีขายในเกมก็เพียงพอแล้ว (แต่ผมชอบใช้สโคป Odin ในแพ็คนี้)

High-Tech Hunting Pack (แนะนำสำหรับคนชอบล่าสัตว์ตอนกลางคืน)
มีดีที่กล้องส่องทางไกล Night Vision นอกนั้นจะเป็นธนูพร้อมกับอุปกรณ์วัดระยะ/ช่วยเล็งและสโคป Night Vision สำหรับปืนไรเฟิล
----------
DLC น้องหมา แบบสั้น ๆ เอาคุ้ม ๆ

Bloodhound เหมาะสำหรับตามรอยเลือดและหาซากสัตว์

German Shorthair Pointer เหมาะสำหรับตามรอยและชี้เป้าสัตว์ แต่อาจทำให้สัตว์ตกใจจนหนีได้

Labrador Retriever เหมาะสำหรับคนชอบยิงเป็ดหรือล่าสัตว์เล็กคลาส 1 สามารถสั่งให้หมาไปคาบซากสัตว์มาให้เราได้ แต่จำกัดแค่สัตว์คลาส 1

เมื่อหมามีความชำนาญเต็ม 15 สามารถให้หมาเรียนรู้ทักษะของหมาสายพันธุ์อื่นได้ เช่น เมื่อหมาเยอรมันชอร์ตแฮร์มีทักษะ Tracking เต็ม หากเรามีหมาบลัดฮาวด์หรือลาบราดอร์ก็สามารถให้หมาเรียนทักษะการตามรอยเลือดหรือคาบสัตว์คลาส 1 มาให้เราได้ (เลือกอย่างใดอย่างหนึ่ง)
----------
สุดท้าย เราจะล่าสัตว์ไปทำไมถ้าไม่มีที่สำหรับโชว์ นี่เลย Saseka Safari Trophy Lodge กว้างกว่า อลังการกว่า ไม่ต้องไปซื้อ Spring Creek Manor หรอก เปลืองเงินเปล่า ๆ

เบื้องต้นเอาไว้แค่นี้ก่อน เดี๋ยวมาเพิ่มจัดอันดับแผนที่น่าซื้อกับรายละเอียดแต่ละแผนที่ว่ามีอะไรดี

184643330.review:
Bin seit ein paar Tagen auch auf den Geschmack des Spieles gekommen.
Komme kaum davon los. 
Jedoch hätte ich da noch einiges was mir fehlt.
Zum allererst hab ich direkt die Musik auf null gestellt (wie eigentlich in fast jedem game).
Ich streife manchmal einfach so durch die Natur um das einfach zu genießen, aber trotz allem (auch durch die Beschilderung) fehlen wandernde NPC welche man zb auch begrüßen könnte (das würde dad Spiel auf eine andere Art noch lebendiger und realer machen). Die Tages und Nachtzeiten sind perfekt nich wie in anderen Spielen wo man kaum zu etwas kommt. Was vielleicht auch noch sehr nice wäre, wenn man im Trophäenhaus einen Kühlraum hätte in dem man die Tiere richtig verwerten könnte und zb das Fleisch und eventuell die Fälle dann gesondert lagern müsste.
Des weiteren würde ich es gut finden wenn man Hunger und Durst bekämpfen und sich ein kleines Lager unterwegs erstellen müsste (und/oder das mit einem Zelt machen muss). Das Spiel ist für mich absolut der Wahnsinn aber mit sehr viel Luft nach oben. 
In diesem Sinne Weidmannsheil 🫡

184603628.review:
Si buscas un juego donde tendrás una experiencia "árcade" de disparos y caza "divertida" te decepcionaras mucho al comprarlo.  Es un juego donde si tienes suerte podrás ver a unos 20 animales en un lapso de una hora de los cuales podrás abatir 5 de buena manera. 

El juego no explica nada de las mecánicas como el uso de las miras, los puestos de vigía, los refugios de caza, las zonas de presión, los ciclos de los animales, la caída de balas, el tiempo de vuelo, los tipos de trofeo, el ciclo nocturno, la importancia del viento y el clima, las zonas muertas, los disparos críticos.... y mil y una cosas más que mejor mirar en Internet.

Los dlc son totalmente indispensables para pasar un mejor rato, en especial el paquete de armas modernas, las tiendas de acampar, los desplegables y lo mas importante las reservas de la sabana y Australia. Son los dos mejores mapas para jugar y disfrutar de la experiencia. 

El juego es divertido cuando llegas al nivel 15 y desbloqueas el 7mm antes te tendrás que conformar con fallar el 70% de todos los trofeos (Los animales que dispares).

Hay un mod increíble donde la población de animales se puede duplicar y la distancia de spawneo se hace 5 veces más grande. Si quieres ir por la vida matando decenas de animales lo recomiendo totalmente. 

7/10.

184571848.review:
I used to be that guy, even as a kid, who looked at hunting video games and thought, "But why? Why not just go hunting?" or "I don't even understand the fun/thrill of hunting animals to begin with, why is it a video games?" Then I saw the game for 90% once, decided to just try it, and now fully understand the answer to both of those questions. 
First off, the graphics and environment is top tier, which makes sense given the genre of the game, it's kind of required to get as good as you can get in AT LEAST those two things. That said, it also delivers great sound/music, controls and game-play, which just makes the entire game top-tier. Although the game can occasionally bug-out, it's usually just a bit frustrating, rarely does it induce rage. There are a number of maps which are massive, the hunt-able animals are also numerous, and the game is consistently updated. It's simply fun and relaxing to play, and now I covet a life like the one in-game.

I spend way too much time stalking digital game. If this game were real life my family would never need to go to the grocery store again and I would have a monthly electric bill in the thousands to run all the freezers I would need to keep the meat.

I had no idea I liked hunting games at all. Didn't really know they existed until I picked this one up as one of the free Epic games of the week. Played it on Epic for quite awhile before I started to both consider buying the DLC and playing on Steam Deck.

Given how much I'd already been enjoying it I just decided to purchase the game and some of the DLC as I felt the devs had more than earned my money.

This is one of those games where reading the wiki as you play is just about essential to having a good experience to understand how lures, decoys, callers, and scent maskers all work.

But once you do the gameplay loop is pretty fantastic. I definitely think this game could be a lot better if some of the LOD/graphics issues were fixed but I do understand that having such massive worlds and long view distances comes with limitations.

Would also be nice to have more missions but I don't think I'll ever get tired of slow-walking through Layton, Hirschfielden, or Revontuli.

184544533.review:
"theHunter: Call of the Wild" has done a great job with living up to the nostalgia I've felt about an old hunting simulator game that I played as a kid - for whatever reason I apparently enjoy redneck hunting games. It delivered what I expected and that is to hunt various wild animals in the wilderness, the animals are skittish enough that it feels somewhat like an accomplishment to manage a harvest, but not skittish enough that it becomes too realistic and in my opinion boring. 

However more maps should be included in the base game, now there's plenty of maps that are locked behind DLCs that you gotta pay for. The main issue I have with that is that many maps introduce animals that cannot be found in any of the base game maps, which force you to buy DLCs if you want access to more variation.

Since I wanted more variation I have bought a couple of maps and I can't say that I regret it, the maps are beautiful and provide a fun gaming experience, although some can become frustrating to hunt in at times due to how the landscape is formed. Anyway again, considering the ratio between base maps and DLC maps there is a little voice in my head that goes "really?" I am not mad at you though "theHunter: Call of the Wild" I am just disappointed. *Rings the shame bell*

I do like the game. 8/10 redneck experience.

184507356.review:
Pretty decent for a hunting game. You need to have a lot of patience to play this, running and gunning will get you squat. 

In the beginning, you won't have great equipment and will often not put animals down right away, mostly because if you new to the game, you won't be sure where to shoot them like I did - pro tip, aim for the front of the animal just above the legs to hit the heart and lungs. Had I known that before, it would have saved me quit a few trips looking for my kill which often died a few hundred metres from where I shot it.

My only real issue with the game is sometimes, or about once per game, I get a perfect kill shot but the animal is not in the place where it was shot. No blood trail either. I usually just search the area until I find it, not at all where I shot it at. The way I know this is I highlight the animal with my binoculars which tags the animal on the map, then shoot and then find the animal about 50 to 100 metres away from where it was tagged. So yeah, it has some bugs, but still a fun game none-the-less. 

I enjoyed it enough to buy the a few DLC while on sale. I give it a good 7/10

优点：优化还行，游戏节奏缓慢，不同国家和地区的自然保护区风景宜人，散步放松惬意，有猎犬跟随，雨雪天气变化沉浸舒心，还可以学会辨别不同品种的鹿，如果不追求猎物的稀有毛色和等级是个非常不错的云散步旅游模拟器
缺点：游戏节奏非常缓慢，不适合没什么耐心的玩家，部分地图同质化（骂的就是新英格兰山脉和德国图），部分狩猎物种是没什么新意的换皮，物种生态系统做得一般，一年出三四个dlc，让玩家耳目一新的其实没多少，云存档会经常损坏，恶性bug没多少但小bug不断
ps：本体两张图相比较之下莱顿湖区狩猎难度较低，建议先开湖区图，如果游玩后有兴趣，可以翻阅测评或者搜索入门指南类视频，按照建议和自身需求购入其余dlc

184397956.review:
Animal tracking is abysmal.
The graphics are crisp, but the game itself is just bad.

Buy a weapon.
Buy ammo.
Move weapon from storage to inventory.
Close window.
Open inventory.
Equip weapon.
Drag ammo to weapon on weapon wheel.
This is just tedious.

To make matters worse, there's no differentiation between tracks and blood, making you lose what you're stalking.
You hit an animal, and try to follow blood, only to find tracks instead.
They should be making the blood markers red instead of the same color as the tracks.

There is also no indication of which call/lure you're using unless you open the radial menu or your inventory.

Weapon descriptions don't include the caliber, leaving you to assume it's in the name of the weapon.
I spent 15 minutes trying to figure out how to use the ammo I just bought with the weapon I just bought.

Again... tedious.
Don't buy this game.

184386884.review:
Don't buy this game unless you REALLY enjoying killing animals. because the only thing you can do after hunt something is hanging their heads on the wall and it will cost you like $8000 in the game. Which you can only get $500~$1000 for each target. EVERYTHING cost you a lot of money in the game like $70000 for a rifle $950 for 10 bullets with very few income.
Basically you won't hunt anything until you bought a bunch of DLC like dogs or high CAL weapon, cars, tents, night vision, bulabulabula since the basic rifle is simply tooooooooooooo useless. Animals start to run away when you approach with 350m~400m, which you can only make a clear shot withing 100m~150m in range. Shotguns have even shorter range like 25m while birds flew away with 200m~300m while approaching.
You need to craw on the ground to avoid being saw or heard by the animals with VERY VERY low speed and found that animals already GONE when you get close enough.
Even you can make a lucky shot with your Ranger .243 , usually no animals with be killed instantly. Then you have to chase them all the way cross the mountain and found them just stop bleeding and disappeared. 
The problem is ALL animals can see you and heard you FAR FAR away and knowing you are a threat and ran away. WHY????? How can they tell the steps are from someone can kill them within 150m???
Especially the small animals you need to kill in short rage. Even the dogs will scare the animals away.
If you are trying to hit the animals with your ATV, you will find that you are the only one who get hurt.
You can't shoot animals while you are riding your ATV and when you get off the bike they simply just disappeared. almost like there is a 5 mins time lag to get off the bike.

So be carefull. Don't buy this game or be ready to pay $80 USD or more for all the DLSs you need for just killing some deer, deer and deer. Deer everywhere.

BTW, most of the time you can see nothing on the map. No birds, no deer, no bulls, nothing. It's perfectly normal in this game.

184311385.review:
Brand new to the game and franchise, only bought it because it was super cheap in the Steam sale but I've really enjoyed it. I've since purchased Way Of The Hunter and am progressing through that.

This is a very relaxing game. I don't usually have the patience for games like these but I've really enjoyed taking my time on the maps and hunting with friends, learning better techniques and levelling up my character and dog. The game maps are really well detailed and huge, the DLC maps are great value at only £2  in the Steam sale so i grabbed a few of the better rated ones and I've loved the diversity of environments i can now play in. The sound design is awesome, i love turning my speakers up loud and just wondering through the maps looking for animals and exploring the areas, listening to the natural world around me. The performance on my ageing machine is great, the graphics are really good and in particular the lighting and weather effects really make sunset/sunrise look great, I think considering this game out in 2017 it puts some much newer AAA games to shame with how good the environments look. You can watch thick clouds roll in across the horizon and then experience the rain or snow that comes with it, i spent some time in game with my friend waiting to ambush hunt and we noted it did indeed happen, the map is a living thing with wind and weather that directly affects you, it's not just a painted sky box. Setting up the tent and changing your load out is handy, the dogs are super helpful and add an extra element to the game, the different types of hunting and prey, everything is well fleshed out. That's IF you buy the DLC.

The only slight downside in my opinion is the DLCs, and how much of what makes this game so good is hidden behind a pay wall when it should be included. Admittedly i never really played the 'vanilla' base version of this game very long because at the time, everything was so cheap so after 15 minutes i just pulled the trigger on stuff because i could already tell i was going to love it. I've spent about £25 in total (including the base game) and have a whole tonne of content, well worth the money. DLC weapon packs are there, and the 'modern rifles' pack is excellent however the other packs contain guns similar to those already in the base game, so i feel they probably only serve as a time savers. The dogs are excellent however should have really been included in the game, the same with tents. The ATV is well worth the £1 i spent on it, even if just to cover ground quickly and open up areas of the map and outposts quickly. The ambush pack is ideal if that's a style of hunting you enjoy, the Yukon map, Australia and African map are some favourites of mine. 

All in all this is an excellent game, way surpassed my expectations considering i only bought it for £3.50 to see what it was like. For a 2017 game it looks amazing and plays really well, very relaxing. Grab the base game and DLCs on Steam sale (or key gen sites if they have them) and enjoy it for what it is, a well made, super relaxing chill game with friends. Or stick a podcast/music on and just enjoy the single player experience on your own.

184307555.developer_response:
Hey Hunter,

Thank you for sharing your review.

I'm sorry to hear that you found the game less amusing than expected. The Hunter is designed with a focus on realism and immersion, which can sometimes lead to longer distances between animal sightings and slower-paced gameplay. The challenge of tracking and patience is a core part of the experience, and it’s not uncommon for players to spend time learning the map and adjusting to the dynamics of animal behavior.

Moose are indeed unique in the game due to their thick hide, dense muscle, and substantial bone structure, which can make them much tougher to penetrate compared to other animals of the same class. This means that even with well-placed shots, it can sometimes seem like the hits don’t register as effectively as they do with other species.

If you have any suggestions or ideas for improvement that you'd like to share with us, we'll be happy to hear from you at: https://support.thehunter.com/hc/en-us/requests/new.

184290770.review:
As someone who loves hunting games, I was excited to dive into The Hunter: Call of the Wild, but unfortunately, it fell short in many areas. The game has great potential with its vast open-world environments and detailed animal models, but the gameplay quickly becomes repetitive and frustrating.

First off, the AI for animals is inconsistent. Sometimes they act like they’re hyper-aware of my presence, and other times they act as if they can’t even hear gunshots. The tracking system is also more frustrating than fun—trying to follow a wounded animal can feel like a chore with no clear indicators, and often, you end up losing the trail entirely for no reason.

The graphics, while impressive in some areas, are also hit-or-miss. While the landscapes look stunning from afar, the details up close can feel lifeless and dated. I’ve encountered several bugs, too—animals disappearing into thin air, and occasionally, the game crashes when transitioning between areas.

Another letdown is the lack of variety. After hunting a few species, the excitement starts to wear off. The repetitive objectives and lack of true challenge made the experience feel more like a grind than a fun adventure.

Lastly, the microtransactions are obnoxious. The game seems to push you to spend extra money on cosmetics and gear, which feels like a cash grab rather than enhancing the gameplay experience.

I really wanted to enjoy The Hunter: Call of the Wild, but after a few hours, I felt more frustrated than entertained. It’s a beautiful world with a lot of potential, but it lacks the polish and depth needed to make it truly engaging for long-term play.

184176786.review: theHunter: Call of the Wild is a great game to help you relax and calm down after a long day at work or dealing with people. This game has incredible vistas and great ambiance that immerses you in its unique take on hunting games. You can take all day setting a lure and working on trap hunting, or you can develop your skills as an ambush hunter. The amount of detail in the animals is amazing—you really do have to time your shots and learn where the actual animals' organs are. This game also shows how important proper and ethical hunting can be to wildlife and an ecosystem. In short, I recommend this game to anyone who is remotely interested in trying a hunting game and also for those who see it on sale—just do it!

184171587.review:
TheHunter: Call of the Wild is an incredibly immersive and addictive hunting simulator. It offers a super realistic experience paired with engaging gameplay that keeps you coming back for more.
Explore a wide variety of hunting environments across the globe, with plenty of game to track and take down.
For those who want to broaden their experience, the game offers a wealth of DLC packs that include new maps, equipment, and animals to hunt.
The game's tracking mechanics are highly detailed, making it both rewarding and satisfying to locate your prey. The trophy and takedown reviews add an extra layer of accomplishment.
Weapons are impressively lifelike, with numerous customisation options to tailor your hunting tools to your preferences. This realism enhances the overall experience significantly.

The game doesn’t do much to explain critical mechanics to new players, such as animal anatomy for effective takedowns, the importance of using the right ammunition, and the impact of noise levels—even at distances over 200 meters.
Grinding for your first strong rifle can feel tedious, making it challenging for new players to get into the groove of the game.
The Bloodhound DLC (for tracking assistance) and certain weapon packs are practically necessary for new players to enjoy a smoother experience, which might feel like an extra cost barrier.
Despite that, I still highly recommend this game and all the extra reserves, especially on sale!

184145892.review:
„theHunter: Call of the Wild“ ist ein absolutes Meisterwerk für Natur- und Jagdsimulationsliebhaber. Das Spiel bietet eine atemberaubend realistische Welt mit detailreichen Landschaften, die von dichten Wäldern über weite Ebenen bis hin zu verschneiten Gebirgen reichen. Die Grafik ist spektakulär und lässt einen immer wieder innehalten, um die Schönheit der Natur zu genießen.

Das Gameplay ist ebenso beeindruckend. Die Jagdmechanik ist komplex und fordert Geduld, Geschick und strategisches Denken. Ob man Spuren liest, Tierverhalten analysiert oder die Umgebung nutzt, um sich lautlos anzuschleichen – jede erfolgreiche Jagd fühlt sich wie ein echter Erfolg an. Besonders spannend ist die Vielfalt der Tierarten und Jagdgebiete, die für langfristige Motivation sorgen.

Ein weiterer Pluspunkt ist der atmosphärische Sound. Von Vogelgezwitscher bis hin zum Rauschen des Windes oder den Geräuschen der Tiere – die Audioqualität trägt maßgeblich zur Immersion bei.

Besonders reizvoll ist der Multiplayer-Modus, in dem man gemeinsam mit Freunden auf die Pirsch gehen kann. Das fördert Teamwork und sorgt für unvergessliche Momente.

theHunter: Call of the Wild ist mehr als nur ein Spiel – es ist ein Erlebnis, das sowohl Entspannung als auch Spannung bietet. Eine klare Empfehlung für alle, die die Natur lieben oder eine realistische Jagdsimulation suchen!

184139938.review:
リアル系狩猟ゲーム。射撃精度が恐ろしく高い。
普通に走っていると100ｍ以上先からでも感知されてしまう。一日中、野山を駆け回って獲物なしとはよく言ったものである。こちらも遠距離から当てられるので五分五分。逃げ惑う獲物を追いかけるのも楽しく、全力で追跡し続けする事で獲物の生態を学ぶ事もできる。
山歩きしながら動物を見かけるとウヒョー！とテンションが上がる方にはおすすめ。自然が好きなら散策するだけで面白い。

以下、一通りDLCを買ったので感想を。
・テント
必要。お気に入りの狩場に拠点を作ろう。これが無いと楽しくない。
・ATV
不要。爆音バギー。体感移動速度3倍だが、木や石にぶつかるとダメージを受けるため最短直線距離は進みにくい。アウトポスト開放やテント設置が進めば増々要らない子に。運転手と銃架（銃座）がついて走りながら50口径マシンガンを撃ちまくれるならよかった。忙しい人向けだが、そもそもこのゲーム、忙しい人には向いていない。
・犬
不要。10時間もプレイすればスキルを習得して自分で追跡できるようになる。賑やかしや痕跡を見失った時の保険にはなるが、視界で動かれると獲物と間違う。犬なので判断が遅い。木や石にに引っ掛かる。等々、メリットもあるが、デメリットもある。
・Hunter Power Pack
DLC武器パックをどれか１つだけ買うならコレ。中～超大型対応の超汎用ライフル「マルメル7mmマグナム」はコスパと弾道の良い優秀な弾薬を使用し、美しく、銃声も最高（個人の感想です）。
・Modern Rifle Pack
連射力が高い中～大型対応の汎用セミオート「ZARZA-10 .308」は低反動で群れにも強い。
・High Caliber Weapon Pack
高精度大型特化セミオート「アルジナ.300タクティカルマグナム」は扱いやすく、大型～超大型を狩るのに最適。
・Scopes and Crosshairs Pack
武器なし有料スコープセット。FPSゲーマーにとってスコープはSRの心臓。歪みの少ない高視野高倍率ライフルスコープ「オーディン」が最初から使え、付ければどんなライフルも素敵なライフルに早変わり。個人的には最初に買ってよかったDLCナンバー1（テント除く）。
・ツリースタンド&トライポッド(三脚)、Ambusher Pack（電子呼び笛）、他Weapon Pack
欲しくなった時に買うのがよい。三脚は強力。
・Silver Ridge Peaks (DLC MAP)
かなり作り込まれている神MAP。初期マップで1時間ほどチュートリアルをやったら、こちらで狩りの練習をしながら資金と経験値を稼ごう。獲物が多く、見晴らしがよい。ゲームが気に入れば他のMAPも購入しよう。

《追記》16日目、レベル41。感想。
・ATV
不要。
・犬
使ってる時は「この駄犬め！」って感じで犬小屋に戻そうかなと考えていたんですが、レトリバーやGポインターを育てていると、ブラッドハウンドが居ればなって時があります。半々です。好みです。視線泥棒です。高低差や障害物に弱いのと「飼い主待ち」が無くなればなぁ…。キミ遠くに居ても視えてるョ。

DLC武器優先度はマルメル＝ZARZA＝アルジナ＞＞＞ヴァイラント(Weapon pack 1)＝ソロキン(Weapon pack 2)だと感じました。３種を入れ替えながら使うと良い感じです。
・マルメル
重量圧縮ができる。数秒だけチラッと動物の姿が見える事が多々あるが、武器併用と違い持ち替えの手間なく撃てるのが強い。その数秒が大事。通常装備武器で輝く。アルジナに弾道が近いのも便利。弾薬はいくらでも持ち歩けるので強弾薬２種類を使い分けよう。
・ZARZA
弾頭が軽いのか３種の中では威力が低めだが、連射力と低反動で安定感がある。狙った所にビシバシ当たるので極まってくると強敵中型相手にはコレかもしれない。
・アルジナ
スペック最強銃。ZARZAと同じように扱えて高威力、超高精度。遠距離も連射もお任せの狂った武器。大型が居たらとりあえずで入れてもいい。ただ狩るだけなら全動物この銃で良いが、評価を気にするなら担当範囲が狭い。そして大型動物が…。
・ヴァイラント
鳥兎無反動連射。ﾎﾟﾎﾟﾎﾟﾎﾟﾎﾟ～ｗ
・ソロキン
特定クラスに最強威力の弾丸を撃ち込めるが、そのクラスの動物が少ない。あとはZARZA等と被ってしまう。アルジナと組み合わせる事もあるかもしれない。弾薬が安いので初心者に優しい。

このゲーム、シカとかの中型動物が強い。用心深く、脚が速い。逃げるときは上下に跳ねながら逃げるので臓器を撃ち漏らしやすい。サイズのわりにタフで途方もない距離を逃走する事もある。対してクラス９の超大型動物は愚鈍で的が大きく、脚も遅い。樹に引っ掛かったりするので追跡も容易。初心者向け動物である。店売りのリボルバーでも何とかなるだろう感がアルジナ最強論を押し下げ、マルメルの評価を上げているように思える。

不満点は、ショットガンが評価システムの関係上、ほぼ鳥兎専用になっている事。弓が趣味武器なのはいいが、散弾銃は実際の狩猟でもよく使用されているはずだ。そして大型動物はもっと怖い存在じゃないとリアルではない。熊が小鹿より狩りやすいのだ。もうこれ、くまのプーさんだよ…。

DLCMAPのEMERALD COASTとTE AWAROAは是非購入しましょう。
付録の武器が強く、MAP自体もとても面白いです。Yukon Valleyも最高です。

184127774.review:
TheHunter: Call of the Wild to gra, która zmienia zwykły wieczór przed ekranem w wyprawę do dzikiej przyrody. Od pierwszych chwil zachwyca realistycznymi krajobrazami – gęste lasy, otwarte łąki i bagniste tereny wyglądają tak, że aż chce się w nie wejść. Do tego dochodzą dźwięki: szum wiatru, śpiew ptaków i odgłosy zwierząt. To nie tylko gra, to symulator życia w dzikiej naturze. Mechanika polowania wymaga cierpliwości i przemyślanych ruchów. Nie ma tu miejsca na chaotyczne strzelanie – trzeba tropić, analizować i działać z rozwagą. Wszystko to sprawia, że gra jest piekielnie wciągająca. Może nawet… za bardzo.

Mój ojciec, człowiek, który zawsze miał ciągoty do natury, wciągnął się w tę grę po uszy. Na początku wyglądało to niewinnie – siadał wieczorami przed laptopem, tropił wirtualne jelenie i opowiadał mi, jak to wreszcie znalazł coś, co go relaksuje. Był w tym tak zafascynowany, że zaczął zgłębiać temat polowania również poza grą. Najpierw kupił książki, potem… strzelbę. „Na pokaz” – tłumaczył. Nikt w rodzinie nie brał tego na poważnie, bo wydawało się, że to tylko chwilowa zajawka.

Z czasem jednak zaczęło się robić dziwnie. Mój stary zaczął znikać na całe weekendy, tłumacząc, że jedzie „na grzyby”. Wracał bez grzybów, za to z jakąś dziwną energią w oczach. Zaczął mówić, że wirtualne polowanie to za mało, że chce poczuć prawdziwy dreszcz emocji. Nikt z nas nie spodziewał się, do czego to doprowadzi.

Pewnego dnia, wracając do domu, zauważyłem dziwny zapach unoszący się w powietrzu. Postanowiłem sprawdzić piwnicę, gdzie ojciec spędzał ostatnio coraz więcej czasu. To, co zobaczyłem, przerosło moje najgorsze wyobrażenia. Na ścianie wisiały trzy ludzkie głowy – jak trofea z gry. Obok leżały ciała. Były to trzy rodziny, które wybrały się na piknik w niewłaściwe miejsce, w niewłaściwym czasie. Mój ojciec stał obok, zadowolony, i powiedział tylko: „Wiesz, synu, w grze to też się robi. Tylko to jest bardziej… prawdziwe.”

Policja szybko odkryła, co się stało, po tym jak sąsiad zgłosił dziwny smród. Ojca zabrano w kajdankach, a ja zostałem sam z traumą. Od tamtego czasu mam problemy, które nie pozwalają mi normalnie funkcjonować. Paranoja, koszmary i obsesyjne sprawdzanie wszystkiego w domu to teraz moja codzienność. Nie mogę spojrzeć na gry, nie czując dreszczu niepokoju.

Mimo tego wszystkiego muszę przyznać, że TheHunter: Call of the Wild to genialna gra. Realizm, piękno i dopracowanie sprawiają, że trudno się od niej oderwać. Daje niesamowitą satysfakcję i pozwala poczuć się jak prawdziwy myśliwy. Jednak gra ta ma swoją ciemną stronę – potrafi wciągnąć tak mocno, że niektórzy tracą kontakt z rzeczywistością.

Czy polecam? Zdecydowanie tak, bo to gra na 10/10

184083808.review:
[h1]入门一段时间后，我觉得这款游戏： [/h1]

[h3] 1. 沉浸式体验 [/h3]
游戏提供了一个广阔且高度详细的开放世界，可以在其中探索各种生态系统，包括森林、草原、山脉等不同的地形。环境的细致描绘和自然音效让人感到身临其境，仿佛置身于大自然之中。游戏中的动物行为和生态系统的动态也非常逼真，动物的种群会根据时间、天气等因素发生变化，增加了游戏的可玩性和挑战性。

[h3]2. 真实的狩猎模拟 [/h3]
对狩猎的模拟非常注重细节。从选取合适的武器到追踪动物足迹，每一步都需要认真思考。动物的反应、听觉和视觉非常灵敏，需要根据动物的习性、天气条件等因素制定合理的狩猎策略。这种逼真的模拟让喜欢深度体验的玩家十分满足。

[h3]3. 多样的游戏模式 [/h3]
游戏提供了多种游戏模式，除了单人模式外，还包括多人合作模式，允许与朋友一起进行狩猎探险，适合喜欢与朋友一起挑战的玩家。此外，还提供了丰富的任务和挑战，可以持续获得奖励和成就感。

[h3]4. 武器与装备的选择 [/h3]
提供了多种猎枪、弓箭、步枪等武器，同时也有各种配件和装备，如瞄准镜、诱饵等，可以根据猎物种类和环境条件选择合适的装备。装备系统较为细致，也给游戏增添了一些策略性。

[h3]5. 图形和音效 [/h3]
游戏的图形非常精美，尤其是自然环境和动物的细节刻画。天气变化、日夜交替、四季变换等都被真实呈现，增加了游戏的沉浸感。音效方面，动物的叫声、风声、树木摇晃等也相当真实，让玩家能够感受到大自然的声音。

[h3]6. 节奏较慢 [/h3]
虽然游戏的沉浸感和细节十分到位，但游戏的节奏相对较慢。狩猎过程可能需要耐心和时间，因为需要仔细观察、追踪、等待猎物出现。这对于喜欢快速游戏节奏的人来说，可能会感到有些枯燥。

[h3]7. 学习曲线 [/h3]
由于游戏模拟的非常真实，初学者可能需要一定的时间来适应游戏机制和狩猎技巧，尤其是追踪和瞄准技能。对于新玩家来说，可能会感觉入门较为困难。

184051943.review:
The landscape is amazing looking especially in 4k, but a pretty setting doesn't make a good game. Walking is slow, (at least it'll tell you how long it'll take you to walk somewhere).  45 minutes to the next outpost (fast travel point) Do you want to fast travel anywhere else on the map like to a feeding point? Buy a tent DLC. Want to ride a vehicle instead of spending the next hour reaching it? Buy an ATV DLC. Need a bigger gun? Buy the modern weapons DLC. Want a place to display the critters you've shot? you get the idea.

Ok, you've picked up the right DLCs for you.. and probably drained your wallet doing so. Great! Now you can spend a few minutes figuring out the wonky UI at the outpost to buy bullets. Fail to take them with you because they default to your storage, Walk back to the outpost and spend another 10 minutes trying to figure out how to put the bullets in your gun until you give up and google it. 

Finally! You've got a gun with bullets that can take down a black bear, elk or moose! AWESOME! now you'll spend time sneaking up, analyzing wind and tracks, lining up that perfect shot and nail it. You hit it right where you were aiming and nailed that double lung shot or something. Great! Now chase it through the underbrush for the next ten minutes as it runs like a Olympic sprinter over the next quarter to half a Kilometer. You find your trophy and difficulty rating is "easy". 

3/10 and that is generous. Its an obvious money grab releasing half a game behind a paywall.

184006350.review:
Kinda fun.  Worth the purchase if it is on sale for less than $10, because you're likely to put in another $20-$30 in DLC if you enjoy the game.  If you don't you'll easily get 5-10 hours of entertainment before moving onto a different game.   

Biggest Negative? My opinion is the bullet ballistics, they're pretty bad and in no way realistic.  Expansion rounds like soft-points or hollow-points are useless are barely pen.  Weapons that the game considers low-caliber are in no way low-caliber, unless we are talking about the .22LR.  I understand this is a game that needs to be balanced around weapons.... but there is no reason why a .243 can't be used against elk or black bear.

Other minor gripes are lack of quick transportation before finding campsites, unless you purchase an ATV DLC.  Lack of "time-forwarding" methods unless you return to a camp or purchase a tent DLC.  Low variety of rifles unless you purchase multiple different weapon pack and reserve DLCs.  Basically, if you have a problem, it can be solves by throwing money at the devs and purchasing a $5.00 DLC that should have just been in the base game. 

Biggest Positives?  Honestly, the TruRac System is pretty cool. The maps themselves are beautiful. The quests keep you progressing and exploring the map.

183958378.review:
最初に…【ゲーム容量注意：システム要件では６０Gとなっていますが、２０２４年末で約９４Gほどです。マルチプレイの仕様上（部屋主にマップDLCあれば参加者はDLC無しでも遊べる・部屋主が未購入なDLC武器を参加者は使える…など）からアプデ自体は全員対象と思われ、DLC未購入であっても容量が大きくなり続けるであろう点に注意。特に、新マップDLC発売後。幸いロード時間が気になる場面は少ないので、外付けHDD（USB3.0接続）でも快適にプレイできています。容量不安な方は、ゲーム購入前にHDD・SSDの購入検討を】
　人を選ぶゲーム。「気が長く、プレイする日はじっくり数時間できる人にはお勧め」かな。逆に、気が短かったり数十分程度しかプレイ時間取れない人には向かない。（特に慣れないうちは１匹狩るまで１０分以上かかることもあるため）
　ゲームのチュートリアルにはかなりの不足感。ゲーム外で、wikiや動画など使って覚えないと十分なプレイは出来ないと思う。幸い、wikiの日本語版はあり解説動画を上げている人も何人かいる（特に狩猟基準まわりはそれら見ないとよくわからなかった）
　ボリュームに見合わない本体価格の”安さ”だが、その分必須級の便利機能のいくつかは別途購入が必要。また、DLCには有用な武器も多い。そのため購入時には「事前にwiki調べたりレビュー見たりしたうえで、本体＋ほしいDLC込みの価格での検討」を推奨したい。幸い、セールをしていることも多いゲームなので、検討した結果高いと思うならウィッシュリスト入れてセール待つこともしやすい。

楽しみ方として…私は「ヘッドフォン付けて作業しつつ、構造物に入って獲物を待ち、鳴き声や足音に反応して狩猟体勢に入る」という待ち伏せ狩りをしている。獲物来ない間の環境音も作業用BGMとして心地良いので、ながら狩り。動画を小音量で見ながらな事すらある。この編集入れている間も…クマとバイソン狩ってきた。「環境音の中で、聞こえるべき音（鳴き声や足音）はしっかり聞こえる」という点も、アピールポイントなのかもしれない。

183905198.review:
The game has a lot of flaws and a LOT of wasted potential (or yet unrealized potential? probably not given the age...), but man, it's still the best and most advanced hunting sim/walking simulator around. The world is seriously beautiful and the animals are lively and loud. Few different playstyles too - rush the animals on your ATV, follow a random track, or just wait near a watering hole + the treestands and other gadgets that i dont really use.
Gameplay is semi-realistic, you are guaranteed to stumble upon an animal quite often - of course, it would be extremely boring if it was 100% realistic, you'd only see a doe every other day...
The shots tracking is cool, spotting is a great mechanic, the tracking works great even through the kind of obnoxious UI elements (the UI is seriously weak, I think they tried to fix it but... meh), i don't really care for lodges.
My favorite map is Medved Taiga, just a great map with a great story and the nights are really creepy in this snowy wasteland. The variety overall could be a bit better though, basically 50% of maps are temperate forests with common small and mid-sized animals, and deer (and newly fowl) make up 90% of your kills, but i suppose it's (semi)realistic. Also I'm not sure how often the animals attack... in reviews people often complain that predators run away, the HP meter (and especially upgrades to it) are pointless. I don't think there's animal infighting either.
I really like the stories and the voice actors, better writing than AAA games lol
The UI is really frigging clunky, and the DLC system kind of ruins any idea of progression (if you just spent several euro on a gun pack, you dont want to grind for it, do you?) so don't get too excited if you're goal-oriented. But there is a [i]little[/i] bit of progression.
So far it sounds like I don't like the game, but I do :) Again, potential and stuff. It has VERY strong foundations and no competition, that's really saving it... For example I was excited that the High Tech pack would bring some real life night vision and heat signature stuff, but it's just a green filter that looks worse than STALKER's from 2005. Oh well, it was included in the bundle...
[strike]...man, if this game had mods the devs would make no profit, because modders put more content into their mods for free...[/strike] Anyway.
OH RIGHT PERFORMANCE. It does look REALLY GOOD sometimes, especially day scenes near water, but it does make my RTX 3090 hot and noisy even in dark and bad looking scenes. You DO need a half decent card to run it at half-decent settings, don't kid yourself with your RX 480. (R.I.P.)
So yeah. I already played for a long time beforehand if you're wondering why... it's worth it despite my salty review. Even just the base game. Pick up the decent rated DLC on a sale. AND GET THE ATV DLC FOR THE BIG MAPS IF NOTHING ELSE!!!!
edit: and thern i went to play and it bugged lmao. It's... quite buggy, yeah. Losing the ability to wield things, getting stuck places, crashing... But a restart fixes it.... *madly muttering* "no competition, best game in the genre, its beautiful most of the time"

183901492.review:
This game is my new addiction. I've had it for years, but could never get into it until now. 

First off, I am a real life hunter and shooter, which helps with enjoyment. If you hate being more than a mile from a Starbucks, this game is not for you. If you hate guns, it's not for you. If you think meat comes wrapped in plastic on little foam trays, It's not for you. 

However, if you like wandering aimlessly, taking your rifle for a walk, listening to the sounds of nature, and can appreciate beautiful creatures of all kinds, then give it a try. 

HCotW is not for everyone, but for the people it is for, it's a masterpiece. Still beautiful 8 years in.

One last thing - The DLC is almost a requirement. 90% of it anyways. The base game only comes with two maps, limited equipment, and no means of transportation aside from you own two feet and sparse fast travel points. If you can spring for the complete bundle, do it.

183744966.review:
I took a while to reflect on this, it's not one that's easily reviewed.

[h3]What is this game?[/h3]
The game was initially meant to be a better and more fun experience to their predecessor, to be a hunting simulator whilst being able to feel the joys of the hunt and the environments.
This has been achieved, but is eventually short lived by the game mechanics.

[h3]Let's talk about the animals[/h3]
The animations on the animals don't feel as robotic compared to the predecessor, which sometimes made me forget this was a game, however there's where the fun ends.
Their AI is extremely comparable to AIs you would find inside hunting arcade games, you are able to run towards deer and they won't really sense immediate danger till you get inside 100 meters from the animal and even then the animals will just stare at you for a bit, usually long enough to get a shot off.
It is also much more easy to get a trophy animal in the game as you are able to manage the herds, yes you still need to put time in it and there's still a bit rng involved but there's no rewarding feeling about the process because of the way animal routines are handled, which is roughly described in the spoilers below.
[b]SPOILERS[/b]:
[spoiler]Animals also have a set routine and you will usually find the same herd at roughly the same places around the same time, which is a downgrade from the predecessor where the animals will walk towards the closest suitable space to "fulfill" their needs.[/spoiler]

[h3]Let's talk about hunting pressure[/h3]
I don't know if this is bugged or is done intentionally, animals are supposed to avoid areas with high hunting pressure, however, often times you will still find animals within these areas.
The area of effect for hunting pressure also feels too small, which is what most players like, but personally I feel like the area of effect should be around 200-300 meters and aside from that should reduce over time by intervals of 1 in-game hour for a duration of 1 or 2 days.
I would expect animals to slowly come back to an area close to the hunting pressure after a while and be nervous about it.

[h3]Let's talk about the skilling system[/h3]
Compared to the predecessor, you gain levels much faster and will affect every species at once and you are able to reset skills at any point in time for a cost with in-game currency, the more skill points you have spent, the more expensive a refund will be.
This would usually be fine, however there are a lot of skill traits that do not help you in any way or form.
To give a few examples ([b]SPOILERS[/b]):
[spoiler]There is a skill that increases your health by 15%, while this seems like a good upgrade at first glance, there are barely any animals that will attack you and those that do usually will not be able to one hit K.O. you.
Then there is a skill which allows you to predict weather, again, on first glance this seems good as in it would help you plan your hunts, however, the weather is constantly changing and rainy weather usually does not last longer than 10 minutes and is often even shorter than that.
Then there's a skill that reduces fall damage, while useful on some reserves, there will be almost no spot where you can actually fall down and if there is, it's usually not high enough to do significant damage.[/spoiler]

[h3]Let's talk about the story element[/h3]
The voice acting with the main stories are nice and that's where it ends.
The stories itself are repetitive, sometimes lackluster and if you pay enough attention to them you will feel like you're cleaning up federal crimes, especially once you get the DLCs.

[h3]Conclusion[/h3]
If you want a quick hunting game, this game is perfect for it.
If you want something more serious, you wouldn't find much joy.

I personally would play the game depending on my mood and perhaps will redo the review if we ever get a game mode that changes every mechanic to be closer to the predecessor.
As such, force disabled need zones, more RNG to where the animals will be located at from their need zones(let's say up to 400m from their need zone location), removes polymer tip ammo for small and medium game, increased prices for supplies and weapons, more realistic animal AI, more aggression from certain animals, etc.

TheHunter: Call of the Wild is designed to offer a complete and fulfilling experience in its base game. Players have access to a wide range of features, tools, and gameplay opportunities without needing to purchase additional content.

The DLCs are entirely optional and created for those who wish to expand their gameplay with new maps, equipment, and features, adding even more variety and depth to the experience. 183708196.review:
Solid title with some caveats,

This is a straight forward open world hunting game. As a result it's basically a walking simulator, but in a good way. The environments are fantastic, and even the oldest maps hold up visually 8 years later. The gameplay loop tends to involve walking around looking for hints on an animals whereabouts, or exploring the world to find 'zones' the animals go to at set times of day. Expect something more along the lines of a walking simulator rather than a fast paced shooter.

Be wary of the monetization, most of the content here is dripfed in small DLC packs with minimal new weaponry and gear to unlock without paying, and all the maps other than 2 are entirely locked behind a paywall

In short, it's a slow paced shooter that is very much a walking sim, but in a good way. Monetization could be rough, but honestly the DLC (and the game itself) go on sale often and can be picked up for cheap so it's not the biggest deal ever. Not everyone's cup of tea, but if it is, you'll probably like it.

We’re glad to hear you enjoy the game’s graphics, and we appreciate you sharing your thoughts with us. Your input helps guide future improvements, and we hope you continue to enjoy the game.

If you have any further suggestions or ideas for improvement that you'd like to share with us, we'll be happy to hear from you at: https://support.thehunter.com/hc/en-us/requests/new.

Hey Kekerit,

TheHunter: Call of the Wild is designed to offer a complete and fulfilling experience in its base game. Players have access to a wide range of features, tools, and gameplay opportunities without needing to purchase additional content.

The DLCs are entirely optional and created for those who wish to expand their gameplay with new maps, equipment, and features, adding even more variety and depth to the experience. Our goal is to give players the freedom to choose what suits their preferences while maintaining a robust and enjoyable experience in the base game.

183598856.developer_response:
Hej bprzemek2,

Dziękujemy za podzielenie się swoją opinią. Rozumiemy, że długie wędrówki po mapie mogą czasami prowadzić do trudnych doświadczeń z znalezieniem zwierząt. W theHunter: Call of the Wild zwierzęta pojawiają się w losowych miejscach, a ich respawn może zająć trochę czasu, co jest częścią realistycznego doświadczenia gry.

Zalecamy spróbowanie zmiany lokalizacji, sprawdzenie różnych regionów na mapie lub wykorzystanie umiejętności, które pomagają w tropieniu zwierząt. Jeśli nadal masz trudności, daj nam znać, a z przyjemnością pomożemy! Napisz do nas na adres: https://support.thehunter.com/hc/en-us/requests/new.

Mamy nadzieję, że mimo tego wyzwania, nadal będziesz cieszyć się grą i odkrywaniem piękna natury w theHunter: Call of the Wild.

183550691.review:
リアル志向な狩猟オープンワールドFPS。

ソロ又はフレンドと3～4人で主にプレイ。ホストがDLCマップを所有していれば参加側は未所持でもプレイ可能です。
個人的にバギーに乗れるATVといずれかの狩猟犬DLCは必須。ハマりそうならDLCマップやトロフィーロッジDLCを購入してトロフィーを飾ると良いでしょう。

プレイヤーが接触した草木の倒れ方を始め、環境音/温度/時間/天気による環境変化をリアルに表現しており、グラフィック含め雰囲気は現実そのもの。
狩った後はどの臓器や部位に当たり死んだのか弾道含め細かな部分まで分かる為、狩った後も楽しめるのは本作の良いところです。
狩る際は小道具を使った鳴き真似で誘き寄せたり、血痕や狩猟犬を用いて追跡したり、他作品では面倒臭いと感じる部分を楽しませてくれます。
しかも一部動物は恐怖故から逆に襲ってきたり群れに衝突して怪我をする場合もあるなど、動物AIや特性を緻密にシミュレートしている点は没入しやすいと思います。

ただミッションに関しては、クリアしなくても良いですが説明不足だったり時間掛かるものが多く、ここだけはストレスになるのでもう少し緩和して欲しい気持ち。
逃げられてばかりで中々狩れないという人は、非公式日本語Wikiを参考にすると狩りやすくなるかもしれません。
https://w.atwiki.jp/thehunter_cotw/pages/20.html

初期2マップを除き他10種類は全て有料DLCなので、トロフィーロッジDLCと同じくもっと遊びたいと感じるようであればセール時に購入してみて下さい。
それとどの銃を使えば良いか分からないという人は下記Noteを参照して下さい。自分は殆ど有料DLCのライフル/ショットガン/マグナム等を使用していました。
https://note.com/michino934/n/n39e0c7d13512
なおレビュー時点で100GB近くあり、HDDだとロードに時間も掛かるので要注意です。
